title: Dancing With da Vinci
description: Teen time travel romance. Teen girl falls through a museum painting and lands in Renaissance France...in the arms of the perfect guy. What does Renaissance France have that 17-year-old Marguerite's modern-day hometown doesn't? Everything. After being rejected from a prestigious art program, devastated Marguerite wanders through a museum wishing she could live among people who really appreciate art. When she is roughly shoved against a painting, she falls and falls and falls, landing in the French countryside of 1519 where she nurses a dying Leonardo da Vinci, joins the entourage of King Francois I and his strong-willed sister, and meets a hot but unpredictable guy who needs her help.
author: E.B. Vale
